intervention_catalogue.name: Accommodation
intervention_catalogue.short_description: Accommodation pathway provides individuals on a community/suspended sentence order with a RAR or on license/post-sentence supervision with accommodation interventions. These services will also be delivered pre-release for individuals who will be under probation supervision on release.

delivery_method.delivery_method_description: Description for Delivery Method for valid Intervention Catalogue Definition No Setting Type

possible_outcomes: Overcome barriers to obtaining/maintaining suitable accommodation

special_educational_needs.exclusion_literacy_level_guide: Able to read and understand simple sentences

exclusion.remaining_license_community_order_guide: 12 months on licence or at least 18 months on community order.
exclusion.mental_health_problem_guide: Identified mental illness, or personality disorder
